key.name: editors
key.default: [ '{ "id": 1, "name": "Android Studio", "native": ["studio"], "flatpak": ["com.google.AndroidStudio"], "arguments": [], "supports_files": false, "enable": false }', '{ "id": 2, "name": "Goland", "native": ["goland"], "flatpak": ["com.jetbrains.GoLand"], "arguments": [], "supports_files": true, "enable": false }', '{ "id": 3, "name": "RustRover", "native": ["rustrover"], "flatpak": [], "arguments": [], "supports_files": true, "enable": true }', '{ "id": 4, "name": "Sublime", "native": ["subl"], "flatpak": ["com.sublimetext.three"], "arguments": [], "supports_files": false, "enable": false }', '{ "id": 5, "name": "VSCode", "native": ["code"], "flatpak": ["com.visualstudio.code"], "arguments": [], "supports_files": true, "enable": true }', '{ "id": 6, "name": "Webstorm", "native": ["webstorm"], "flatpak": ["com.jetbrains.WebStorm"], "arguments": [], "supports_files": true, "enable": true }', '{ "id": 7, "name": "Windsurf", "native": ["windsurf"], "flatpak": [], "arguments": [], "supports_files": true, "enable": false }', '{ "id": 8, "name": "Zed", "native": ["zed"], "flatpak": ["dev.zed.Zed"], "arguments": [], "supports_files": true, "enable": false }' ]
